page.title: 10NEW HOUSING IN WINGERWORTH
page.content: In Wingerworth 3 new housing estates are being built by SNW, Tarmac and Adlington. We asked the sales representative at Tarmac these questions: { { {What was the site used for before you {started building? It was a field that was once part of Wingerworth Hall { {When did you start building? April 1984, we plan to be finished in 2 years. { {How many houses are going to be built {and of what type? } 200 houses 2 and 3 bedroomed semi-detached 3 bedroomed detached 4 bedroomed detached
